content.title: Customer Month Selfie Competition
content.visibleText: Customer Month Selfie Competition. To celebrate our customers and our global presence, we are launching a month-long selfie competition. All staff members are encouraged to get involved and winners will receive a variety of gifts from the contest. There's also something for everyone since Jive PGs are given a sit down on how you can look and feel with before you get snapping, so check it out!

content.title: This June, We Celebrate Our Valued Customers
content.visibleText: This June, We Celebrate Our Valued Customers. Continuing our 50th-year celebrations in June, we celebrate our customers! Join us for a fun journey packed with quizzes, competitions, and try out some tea kiosks. Join us on a journey to learn more about our valued customers. Stay tuned and keep a look out for more updates shortly and don't miss out on the exciting month ahead!
